DOC.brief_summary: The propose study aim examine hypothesis strawberry supplementation lower serum biomarkers inflammation improve knee function patient symptomatic osteoarthritis ( OA ) .
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator propose follow two specific aim randomize crossover placebo-controlled trial participant two feature metabolic syndrome symptomatic osteoarthritis 12-week efficacy study : Aim 1 : To assess effect strawberries biomarkers inflammation [ serum level C-reactive protein : CRP ; inflammatory cytokine : interleukin-6 : IL-6 ; interleukin 1β : IL-1β ; tumor necrosis factor-alpha : TNFα ] Aim 2 : To assess effect strawberry knee function assess overall musculoskeletal examination pain score ( ICOAP HAQ-DI ) .
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis knee osteoarthritis Must waist circumference > 35 inch woman > 40 inch men Cancer Heart disease Smoking Berry allergy
